name: Out of Hand (YahArt)
description:
Just a short prototype game I made to get familiar with the Construct 3 Game Engine.

Sounds from https://soundsbydane.itch.io/8-bit-sound-pack and https://gooseninja.itch.io/minimalistc-loops were used. Credit goes to the creators.

For the font I used https://www.dafont.com/brush-hours.font

The aim is to win at Rock Paper Scissor before the objects hit the ground.
